nodes.text: Cartao was a planet in the Prackla sector. The siviviv vine was native to Cartao, and it was the homeworld of the Cranscoc.
During the Galactic War, upstart crime bosses like Mal Khestekk tried to become important figures in the underworld of Cartao.
Cartao was the source of Spaarti cloning cylinders. The world reluctantly sided with the Galactic Republic during the Clone Wars and the Battle of Cartao was fought in 22 BBY.
In the Portuguese language, "cartao" (more properly cartão) is the word for "card" (as in "credit card").
